short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: JSON Grommer gives you beautifully groomed JSON data that is copied on just single click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform messy raw JSON into sleek, well-organized, and beautifully formatted data with JSON Groomer, the ultimate Chrome extension for developers and data enthusiasts.

Key Features:

- Effortless Formatting: Clean and groom JSON data with a single click for instant readability.
- Quick Copy: Copy your groomed JSON in one step, ready for use in any project.
- Save Time: No more switching between websites or writing tedious formatting scripts.
- Seamless Integration: Works right in your browser, streamlining your workflow like never before.

Say goodbye to cluttered JSON and hello to polished perfection. JSON Groomer makes your data work smarter, not harder. Try it today and experience effortless formatting at your fingertips!
